Comment.Language: On the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt:

Text.Language: Ps/ri m~V]: afi~ e~qoun e~t~,wra n~,/mi: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
The Son of God, entered into the land of Egypt. Save us and have mercy on us.
